import React ,{} from 'react' import Notification from './Notification' import useConnectionHook from '../Hooks/connectionHook' const {useSupplier} = require('../context/Refresh') const Connection = () => { const {triggerUpdate} = useSupplier() const{connections , getConnections} = useConnectionHook() useEffect(() => { getConnections() }, [triggerUpdate]) return ( <>
